Class TreasureBox

extends java.lang.Object

      • putIn

        public TreasureBox putIn(TreasureBox.Gem type,
                         int count)
        stores a number of Gems in the box count should be a positive number, otherwise an IllegalArgumentException is thrown
        Parameters:
        type - the type of Gem
        count - the number of Gems to be stored
        Returns:
        this (for chaining)

      • takeOut

        public TreasureBox takeOut(TreasureBox.Gem type,
                           int count)
        takes out a number of Gems from the box count should be a positive number, otherwise an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Ideally, count should be less than or equal to the number of Gems of that type currently stored.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of Gem
        count - the number of Gems to be taken out
        Returns:
        this (for chaining)

        toType - target type
        Returns:
